statements: SELECT * FROM legal_citations;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM legal_citations;
SELECT citation_id, case_name, judge_name FROM legal_citations WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM legal_citations ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM legal_citations GROUP BY judge_name HAVING case_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations WHERE case_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, court_name, judge_name FROM legal_citations WHERE judge_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_citations WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM case_date) = 2021 AND court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT court_name) AS num_courts, AVG(LENGTH(case_number)) AS avg_case_number_length FROM legal_citations;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND judge_name IN ('Judge A', 'Judge B') ORDER BY case_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_citations WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT citation_id, case_name, date_published FROM legal_citations WHERE date_published > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attorney_id, name, specialization FROM attorneys;
SELECT name, law_firm, years_practicing FROM attorneys WHERE specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT citation_id, case_name, date_published FROM legal_citations WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' ORDER BY date_published DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations WHERE case_name LIKE 'A%' AND court_name = 'District Court' ORDER BY citation_id;
SELECT citation_id, case_name, court_name FROM legal_citations WHERE date_published > '2022-01-01' AND court_name IN ('Supreme Court', 'District Court') ORDER BY citation_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT attorney_id, name, years_practicing FROM attorneys WHERE specialization = 'Criminal Law' ORDER BY years_practicing DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT attorney_id, name, specialization FROM attorneys WHERE law_firm = 'Smith & Associates' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_cases WHERE case_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT judge_name, court_name FROM judges ORDER BY court_name DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM citations WHERE citation_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT cited_case_id, citing_case_id FROM citations ORDER BY citation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, court_name FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC;
SELECT j.judge_name, c.case_name FROM judges j INNER JOIN legal_cases c ON j.court_name = c.court_name;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations;
SELECT case_id, case_name, court_name FROM legal_citations ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_email, law_firm FROM lawyers WHERE law_firm = 'Smith & Co';
SELECT * FROM law_firms WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY firm_name ASC;
SELECT referencing_case_id, referenced_case_id, reference_date FROM case_references ORDER BY reference_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations ORDER BY case_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_citations WHERE court_name='Supreme Court';
SELECT lawyer_name, law_firm FROM lawyers WHERE law_firm='ABC Law Firm' ORDER BY lawyer_name ASC;
SELECT referencing_case_id, referenced_case_id, reference_date FROM case_references WHERE reference_date>'2020-01-01';
SELECT lc.case_name, lf.firm_name FROM legal_citations lc INNER JOIN law_firms lf ON lc.court_name = lf.location;
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM LegalCases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT judge_name, years_experience FROM Judges WHERE years_experience > 10;
SELECT court_name, court_location FROM Courts ORDER BY court_name DESC;
SELECT case_name, citation FROM LegalCases WHERE case_name LIKE '%fraud%' AND citation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT court_name, judge_name, case_name FROM LegalCases;
SELECT * FROM CaseReferences WHERE case_id = 5;
SELECT court_name, court_location FROM Courts WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT judge_name, years_experience FROM Judges ORDER BY years_experience DESC;
SELECT case_name, citation FROM LegalCases WHERE case_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
